steps.title: Purchase a bottle of Rooh Afza syrup.
steps.content: Purchase a bottle of Rooh Afza syrup. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Place 225ml (7.6oz) of water or milk in a 350ml (12oz) glass.
steps.content: Place 225ml (7.6oz) of water or milk in a 350ml (12oz) glass.

steps.title: Add 2 tbsp (40ml) of Rooh Afza syrup to water or milk (more or less according to taste).
steps.content: Add 2 tbsp (40ml) of Rooh Afza syrup to water or milk (more or less according to taste).

steps.title: Stir until the syrup is completely dissolved.
steps.content: Stir until the syrup is completely dissolved.

steps.title: Add 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar, if desired, to taste.
steps.content: Add 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar, if desired, to taste. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Add two or three mint leaves and ice cubes.
steps.content: Add two or three mint leaves and ice cubes. You can also add some chopped pistachio nuts or slivered almonds to your drink.
